SELECT t.id, t.project_id, t.oper_user, t.source_id, t.oper_type, t.oper_module, t.oper_title, t.oper_time, t.oper_content, t1.NAME userName, t2.`name` projectName FROM operating_log t LEFT JOIN `user` t1 ON t.oper_user = t1.id LEFT JOIN project t2 ON t.project_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN workspace w on t2.workspace_id = w.id
t.oper_type in ('UPDATE','BATCH_UPDATE') and t.oper_content is not null
and t.source_id like #{request.sourceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by t.oper_time desc
